name: 魔装術師アカネ / Magic MechSuit Akane
name_original: 魔装術師アカネ / Magic MechSuit Akane
description:
• Combine up to 16 sites to create powered suit
  • Play 1 VS1 with preset machine and self-made machine offline
  • Online up to 3 VS3 match (IP connection, simple matching server installed)

For the product description at the moment, please see the early access explanation.


Please prepare XInput compatible controller.
